name: Staked USD Coin
description: Staked USD Coin (sUSD) is a decentralized stable asset built on the BNB Smart Chain. It represents a staked version of USD-backed tokens and serves as a key component in the HedgeCore ecosystem â€” a transparent, yield-generating framework for stable assets. sUSD maintains a 1:1 peg with USDC through on-chain liquidity and automated rebalancing mechanisms, while allowing users to stake, earn yield, and participate in DeFi strategies with minimal volatility.
